objects.name: Analytic 0053
objects.description: A process loads a shared object (.so) via dlopen/LD_PRELOAD/open from non-standard or temporary locations (e.g., /tmp, /dev/shm), especially shortly after that .so is written or fetched, or linked via manipulated environment variables (LD_PRELOAD/LD_LIBRARY_PATH).

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: openat/read/mmap: Open/mmap .so files from non-standard paths

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:EXECVE
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Processes launched with LD_PRELOAD/LD_LIBRARY_PATH pointing to non-system dirs

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: sudo or service accounts invoking loaders with suspicious env vars

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: http/file-xfer: Inbound/outbound transfer of ELF shared objects

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: (/tmp, /dev/shm, /var/tmp, user home dirs) – adjust to your environment.
Correlate write/fetch of .so to its load (e.g., 0–30 minutes).
Known-good signed or hashed shared objects.
